testcase.name: Error message shown on the login page when invalid credentials entered
testcase.skipped: Given Open the app url......................................................undefined When the user enters username "random" on the username text box.............undefined And the user enters password "sdfsf" on the password text box...............undefined And the user clicks the LogIn button........................................undefined Then the invalid credentials error message "We didn't recognize the username or password you entered. Please try again." should be displayed.undefined

testcase.name: Check error message "Error: Email address required"
testcase.skipped: Given Open the app url......................................................undefined When the user clicks on Forgot Password link................................undefined And the user clicks on the Submit Button....................................undefined Then the error message "Error: Email address required" should be displayed..undefined
